analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x71e562513d5a353e699709916f5650b951be0e86.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x71e562513d5a353e699709916f5650b951be0e86.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/44/0x71e562513d5a353e699709916f5650b951be0e86.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/44/0x71e562513d5a353e699709916f5650b951be0e86.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/44/0x71e562513d5a353e699709916f5650b951be0e86.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
